review.title: “This is a company with no morals”
review.pros: Pros – Great technology (badly executed).They have some awesomely smart people
review.cons: Cons – After leaving they do not pay bills and use you personal info for company business.Company does not understand how to operate in a US environment and does what it can to circumvent the rules of business in the US.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop doing business in US or get a grip on how to do it.Get your company values in place before you hire any more US people.
